name: Kiwi (Alexandre Lavoie)
description:
Will kiwi come home? Who will he meet? What will he learn?

Kiwi is a short story prototype with the theme of "environment awareness". It is a fun, cute, slow-paced experience that lets you admire your surroundings and discover the unknown. Don't let the artwork distract you from what lies ahead...

Kiwi was created over a month by the int kiwi team of Vanier College. I want to personally thank Natalia Perepelitsa and Maria Sara Florez for their collaboration.
